title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 95/88 of 14 January 1988 derogating for the first quarter of 1988 from Regulation (EEC) No 2377/80 in respect of the issue of import licences under certain special arrangements in the beef and veal sector
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 95/88
of 14 January 1988
derogating for the first quarter of 1988 from Regulation (EEC) No 2377/80 in respect of the issue of import licences under certain special arrangements in the beef and veal sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 1 of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3893/87 (4)
- paragraph 1, 'Articles 9 to 12' is replaced by 'Articles 9 to 11',
- paragraph 2, 'points a), b) and e)' is replaced by 'points a) and b)'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 January 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 24.
(2) OJ No L 48, 17. 2. 1987, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 241, 13. 9. 1980, p. 5.
(4) OJ No L 365, 24. 12. 1987, p. 48.
